enhanced_by.reason: isValueCode(char) is used to determine if a character is a valid value code, which is a prerequisite for getValueType(char).
parsePattern(String) uses getValueType(char) to determine the type of options, making it a good candidate for asserting the correctness of getValueType(char).
TypeHandler.getConverter(Class<?>) retrieves converters based on the class type returned by getValueType(char), making it useful for asserting the type mapping correctness.
